name: dragula2
description: Drag and drop so simple it hurts

scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment && npm run sync
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git add package.json && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.styles: cp dragula.css dist/dragula.css && cleancss dist/dragula.css -o dist/dragula.min.css
scripts.sync: git checkout gh-pages ; git merge master ; git push ; git checkout master

author: Nicolas Bevacqua <nicolasbevacqua@gmail.com> (http://bevacqua.io/)
